doc:
Steve Schirripa https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Schirripa 0 Steven Ralph Schirripa (, Italian pronunciation: [skirˈripa]; born August 1, 1958) is an American actor, producer, author, and voice artist. He is best known for portraying Bobby Baccalieri on The Sopranos. Schirripa is a producer and host of two Investigation Discovery series Karma's A B*tch! and Nothing Personal. He was a regular cast member of The Secret Life of the American Teenager and the voice of Roberto in the Open Season franchise. Schirripa has also done commercials for Lamisil, Dick's Sporting Goods, and McDonald's. He has a recurring role as a police investigator in the CBS crime-drama Blue Bloods. Steven_Ralph_Schirripa ( ,_Italian_pronunciation : [_skirˈripa_] ; born August_1_,_1958 ) is an_American_actor , producer , author , and voice_artist . He is_best_known for portraying Bobby_Baccalieri on The_Sopranos . Schirripa is a_producer_and_host of two_Investigation_Discovery_series_Karma 's_A_B*tch ! and Nothing_Personal . He was a_regular_cast_member of The_Secret_Life of the_American_Teenager and the_voice of Roberto in the_Open_Season_franchise . Schirripa has_also_done commercials for Lamisil , Dick 's_Sporting_Goods , and McDonald 's . He has a_recurring_role as a_police_investigator in the_CBS_crime-drama_Blue_Bloods .
